comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Here's the corresponding Wikipedia page on "Lieutenant General Sir Edwin Alfred Hervey Alderson." "During the First World War he was placed in command of the Canadian Expeditionary Force during the first half of the war but made enemies amongst the Canadian political and military elite and suffered disastrous casualties during operations in 1915 which forced his sidelining and eventual retirement from service."

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: bior: thanks for pointing us to Alderson's full name.  We'll include it next time we update the description.
